data.title: Accused of child molestation and child pornography
data.text:
Victor Salva is a film director known for films like Powder, Jeepers Creepers, and Jeepers Creepers 2.

In 1988 Salva was convicted of sexual misconduct with a 12-year-old actor in one of his films. He was also convicted of procuring a child for pornography, as he was alleged to have videotaped the encounter. He served 15 months in prison.
